trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于呈现具有视觉样式的文本框控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer> class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现文本框控件使用的操作系统的当前视觉样式的方法。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果您正在绘制应具有的当前的视觉样式的外观的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: To draw a text box, use one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制的文本框中，使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a variety of options, such as applying text formatting or specifying text bounds.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法提供了各种选项，如应用文本格式或指定文本边界。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> will draw the text box with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的文本框。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is set to one of the elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为一个元素的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> method to draw a text box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法，以便绘制一个文本框。

trans-unit.source: The control also allows the user to select one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values to apply to the text box text.
trans-unit.target: 控件还允许用户选择其中一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>要应用于文本的数值复选框，文本。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有操作系统的当前视觉样式的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the text box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制文本框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本框边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定状态和边界的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the text box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制文本框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本框边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要在文本框中绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>textBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定的状态和边界以及指定的文本的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the text box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制文本框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本框边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要在文本框中绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>textBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定 <c>textBoxText</c> 边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text and text bounds.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定的状态和边界以及指定的文本和文本边界的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the text box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制文本框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本框边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要在文本框中绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>textBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text and text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定的状态和边界以及指定的文本和文本格式的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the text box.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制文本框的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本框边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to draw in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要在文本框中绘制的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <c>textBoxText</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the bounds of <c>textBoxText</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定 <c>textBoxText</c> 边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState" /> 值之一，它指定文本框的可视状态。

trans-unit.source: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text, text bounds, and text formatting.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定的状态和边界以及指定的文本、文本边界和文本格式的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState%29> method in a custom control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method to draw a text box.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState%29>中自定义控件的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，以便绘制一个文本框。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer" /> class can be used to draw a text box with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer" /> 类是否可用于绘制具有视觉样式的文本框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法会引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property to determine whether to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性来确定是否使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类。
